Welcome to sc_intNMF’s documentation!¶

sc_intNMF is a python library for analysis of single cell multiomic data. Example data found at 10x genomics. It offers a simple and intuitive API.

Check out the Usage section for further information, inculding how to install the project.

Note

This project is under development.
